leaderboard.description: Shows a leaderboard around a player on a server sorted by total score, time played or score/min.
leaderboard.notes: You can ommit the sorting method and just type the player name, it will then sort by score.

map.description: Shows a graph of the most used maps in a server over the last day, week or month.
map.notes: You can ommit the period and just type the player name, it will then choose month as the period.

online.description: Shows a list of the server's online players and their time played since the last join. Also shows a graph of the server's population through the day.

playerh.description: Shows a graph of the minutes played each day on a server over the last day, week or month.
playerh.notes: You can ommit the period and just type the player name, it will then choose week as the period.

players.description: Shows a graph of the score earned on a server over the last day, week or month.
players.notes: You can ommit the period and just type the player name, it will then choose week as the period.

population.description: Shows a graph of the population of a server over the last day, week or month.
population.notes: You can ommit the period and just type the server, it will then choose day as the period.

rank.description: Shows a graph of the server rank over the last day, week or month.
rank.notes: You can ommit the period and just type the server, it will then choose month as the period.

server.description: Shows current display name, status, ip and online player count of a server.

stats.description: Shows the leaderboard rank, total score, time played and score/min of a player on a server.

steaminfo.description: Shows some information from steam of a steam user.
syntax: **Input:** SteamID (``STEAM_X_Y_Z``), SteamID64 (``765611XXXXXXXXXXX``) or profile's custom URL (steamcommunity.com/id/``skeke``/)
